trans-unit.source: Manage iOS Activation Lock on devices | Microsoft Intune
trans-unit.target: Manage iOS Activation Lock on devices | Microsoft Intune

trans-unit.source: Microsoft Intune can help you manage iOS Activation Lock, a feature of the Find My iPhone app for iOS 7.1 and later devices.
trans-unit.target: Microsoft Intune can help you manage iOS Activation Lock, a feature of the Find My iPhone app for iOS 7.1 and later devices.

trans-unit.source: Help protect iOS devices with Activation Lock bypass for Microsoft Intune
trans-unit.target: Help protect iOS devices with Activation Lock bypass for Microsoft Intune

trans-unit.source: Microsoft Intune can help you manage iOS Activation Lock, a feature of the Find My iPhone app for iOS 8.0 and later devices.
trans-unit.target: Microsoft Intune can help you manage iOS Activation Lock, a feature of the Find My iPhone app for iOS 8.0 and later devices.

trans-unit.source: Activation Lock is enabled automatically when a user opens the Find My iPhone app on a device.
trans-unit.target: Activation Lock is enabled automatically when a user opens the Find My iPhone app on a device.

trans-unit.source: After it is enabled, the user's Apple ID and password must be entered before anyone can:
trans-unit.target: After it is enabled, the user's Apple ID and password must be entered before anyone can:

trans-unit.source: Turn off Find My iPhone
trans-unit.target: Turn off Find My iPhone

trans-unit.source: Erase the device
trans-unit.target: Erase the device

trans-unit.source: Reactivate the device
trans-unit.target: Reactivate the device

trans-unit.source: How Activation Lock affects you
trans-unit.target: How Activation Lock affects you

trans-unit.source: While Activation Lock helps secure iOS devices and improves the chances of recovering a lost or stolen device, this capability can present you, as an IT admin, with a number of challenges.
trans-unit.target: While Activation Lock helps secure iOS devices and improves the chances of recovering a lost or stolen device, this capability can present you, as an IT admin, with a number of challenges.

trans-unit.source: For example:
trans-unit.target: For example:

trans-unit.source: A user sets up Activation Lock on a device.
trans-unit.target: A user sets up Activation Lock on a device.

trans-unit.source: The user then leaves the company and returns the device.
trans-unit.target: The user then leaves the company and returns the device.

trans-unit.source: Without the user's Apple ID and password, there is no way to reactivate the device.
trans-unit.target: Without the user's Apple ID and password, there is no way to reactivate the device.

trans-unit.source: You need a report of all devices that have Activation Lock enabled.
trans-unit.target: You need a report of all devices that have Activation Lock enabled.

trans-unit.source: You want to reassign some devices to a different department during a device refresh in your organization.
trans-unit.target: You want to reassign some devices to a different department during a device refresh in your organization.

trans-unit.source: You can only reassign devices that do not have Activation Lock enabled.
trans-unit.target: You can only reassign devices that do not have Activation Lock enabled.

trans-unit.source: To help solve these problems, Apple introduced Activation Lock bypass in iOS 7.1.
trans-unit.target: To help solve these problems, Apple introduced Activation Lock bypass in iOS 7.1.

trans-unit.source: This lets you remove the Activation Lock from supervised devices without the user's Apple ID and password.
trans-unit.target: This lets you remove the Activation Lock from supervised devices without the user's Apple ID and password.

trans-unit.source: Supervised devices can generate a device-specific Activation Lock bypass code, which is stored on Apple's activation server.
trans-unit.target: Supervised devices can generate a device-specific Activation Lock bypass code, which is stored on Apple's activation server.

trans-unit.source: Supervised mode for iOS devices lets you use Apple Configurator to lock down a device and limit functionality to specific business purposes.
trans-unit.target: Supervised mode for iOS devices lets you use Apple Configurator to lock down a device and limit functionality to specific business purposes.

trans-unit.source: Supervised mode is generally only for corporate-owned devices.
trans-unit.target: Supervised mode is generally only for corporate-owned devices.

trans-unit.source: How Intune helps you manage Activation Lock
trans-unit.target: How Intune helps you manage Activation Lock

trans-unit.source: Intune can request the Activation Lock status of both supervised and unsupervised devices that run iOS 8.0 and later.
trans-unit.target: Intune can request the Activation Lock status of both supervised and unsupervised devices that run iOS 8.0 and later.

trans-unit.source: For supervised devices only, Intune can retrieve the Activation Lock bypass code and directly issue it to the device.
trans-unit.target: For supervised devices only, Intune can retrieve the Activation Lock bypass code and directly issue it to the device.

trans-unit.source: If the device has been wiped, you can directly access the device by using the code as the user name and a blank password.
trans-unit.target: If the device has been wiped, you can directly access the device by using the code as the user name and a blank password.

trans-unit.source: **The business benefits of this are**:
trans-unit.target: **The business benefits of this are**:

trans-unit.source: The user gets the security benefits of the Find My iPhone app.
trans-unit.target: The user gets the security benefits of the Find My iPhone app.

trans-unit.source: You can enable users to do their work and know that when a device needs to be repurposed, you can retire or unlock it.
trans-unit.target: You can enable users to do their work and know that when a device needs to be repurposed, you can retire or unlock it.

trans-unit.source: How to use Activation Lock bypass from the Intune admin console
trans-unit.target: How to use Activation Lock bypass from the Intune admin console

trans-unit.source: After you bypass the Activation Lock on a device, a new Activation Lock is automatically applied if the Find My iPhone app is opened.
trans-unit.target: After you bypass the Activation Lock on a device, a new Activation Lock is automatically applied if the Find My iPhone app is opened.

trans-unit.source: Because of this, **you should be in physical possession of the device before you follow this procedure**.
trans-unit.target: Because of this, **you should be in physical possession of the device before you follow this procedure**.

trans-unit.source: In the [Microsoft Intune administration console](https://manage.microsoft.com), choose **Groups** > **All Devices** > **All Corporate-owned Devices**.
trans-unit.target: In the [Microsoft Intune administration console](https://manage.microsoft.com), choose **Groups** > **All Devices** > **All Corporate-owned Devices**.

trans-unit.source: Select the device whose Activation Lock you want to bypass.
trans-unit.target: Select the device whose Activation Lock you want to bypass.

trans-unit.source: Choose **Activation Lock Bypass**.
trans-unit.target: Choose **Activation Lock Bypass**.

trans-unit.source: Read the warning message.
trans-unit.target: Read the warning message.

trans-unit.source: Choose **Yes** to proceed.
trans-unit.target: Choose **Yes** to proceed.

trans-unit.source: You can examine the status of the unlock request on the details page for the device.
trans-unit.target: You can examine the status of the unlock request on the details page for the device.

trans-unit.source: How to see which devices are using Activation Lock
trans-unit.target: How to see which devices are using Activation Lock

trans-unit.source: You can see which devices are using Activation Lock in two ways:
trans-unit.target: You can see which devices are using Activation Lock in two ways:

trans-unit.source: Run the **Mobile Device Inventory Reports**.
trans-unit.target: Run the **Mobile Device Inventory Reports**.

trans-unit.source: This report displays the **Activation Lock Status** and **Supervised** columns to indicate the state of devices.
trans-unit.target: This report displays the **Activation Lock Status** and **Supervised** columns to indicate the state of devices.

trans-unit.source: The values for **Supervised** are **Yes** or **No**, and the values for **Activation Lock Status** are:
trans-unit.target: The values for **Supervised** are **Yes** or **No**, and the values for **Activation Lock Status** are:

trans-unit.source: Enabled with bypass code
trans-unit.target: Enabled with bypass code

trans-unit.source: Enabled without bypass code (device is not supervised)
trans-unit.target: Enabled without bypass code (device is not supervised)

trans-unit.source: Enabled without bypass code (device cannot be reached)
trans-unit.target: Enabled without bypass code (device cannot be reached)

trans-unit.source: Not enabled
trans-unit.target: Not enabled

trans-unit.source: The **Activation Lock Status** box is blank for devices that do not run iOS 8.0 or later.
trans-unit.target: The **Activation Lock Status** box is blank for devices that do not run iOS 8.0 or later.

trans-unit.source: Select a device in a groups view to see the Activation Lock status in the device details pane.
trans-unit.target: Select a device in a groups view to see the Activation Lock status in the device details pane.

trans-unit.source: If you select a device in the **All Corporate-owned Devices** node and Activation Lock is enabled for the device, you can also see the bypass code.
trans-unit.target: If you select a device in the **All Corporate-owned Devices** node and Activation Lock is enabled for the device, you can also see the bypass code.

trans-unit.source: This code can be used to manually issue an Activation Lock bypass.
trans-unit.target: This code can be used to manually issue an Activation Lock bypass.

trans-unit.source: Intune takes inventory from devices for Activation Lock every seven days.
trans-unit.target: Intune takes inventory from devices for Activation Lock every seven days.

trans-unit.source: Because of this, devices might not immediately be displayed with their Activation Lock status in the Intune console.
trans-unit.target: Because of this, devices might not immediately be displayed with their Activation Lock status in the Intune console.

trans-unit.source: See also
trans-unit.target: See also

trans-unit.target: [Retire devices](retire-devices-from-microsoft-intune-management.md) [Help protect your devices with remote lock and passcode reset](use-remote-lock-and-passcode-reset-in-microsoft-intune.md)
